title: 谁有1.7.10的防假人插件吗熊孩子很讨厌！
author: wuliao_dada
txt_content: 有熊孩子卡bug被ban用假人插件压测服很烦

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
[安全][PoS] AntiAttackRL —— 让熊孩子们的压测失效吧！[Bukkit+BC+Sponge][1.7+]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-877521-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: liu1413749944
replies.txt_content: 单独的NEVERLAG清道夫插件内部有反压测

replies.author: lingdidi
replies.txt_content:
可以考虑使用杰克的星盾
